a: ^0: "You seem to be doing well on your own. At this rate you'll be slime hunting in the big leagues in no time."
b: ^0: "I've left some goodies for you in the chest there. Hope you like it."
c: ^1: "Anything from Master Kuro will be treasured by me. This blade you've given me is so valuable, I even keep it with me in the bath."
e: ^0: "With that, I'm going to run ahead to the village. I need to handle some business. If you can't find me just ask that fat bastard of a blacksmith."
f: ^1: "There goes Master Kuro again, always darting off on his own adventures."
